name: AnOriginal Game
description:
Complete all the secret achievements and get the trophy. 

This game is an idea that came to me while unsuccessfully trying to sleep. It's not very original, visually pleasing nor well made. It's a dumpster, but its my dumpster. Hope you find some amusement in it. (You can also make speedruns of it easily).

P.D.: Do not try to close the game (big 'X' in the corner) it will simply freeze the game.
